name: Emerald Interior
subtitle: Acrylic Latex Paint
heading: Premium Interior Paint Solution
description: Sherwin-Williams Emerald Interior Acrylic Latex Paint delivers exceptional performance and stunning aesthetics. This premium paint offers superior coverage, excellent hide, and a smooth, luxurious finish. Designed for both residential and commercial applications, it provides long-lasting durability and easy maintenance. The advanced formula ensures excellent color retention and resistance to stains and scuffs.
keyFeatures: Low VOC formula for healthier indoor air quality

name: Cloe Tile
subtitle: Ceramic Wall Tile
heading: Elegant Ceramic Wall Tile Collection
description: The Cloe Tile collection from Bedrosians Tile & Stone brings timeless elegance to any space. These ceramic wall tiles feature a beautiful finish and precise dimensions, making them perfect for bathrooms, kitchens, and feature walls. The durable ceramic construction ensures long-lasting beauty and easy maintenance, while the versatile design complements both modern and traditional interiors.
keyFeatures: Suitable for wet areas including bathrooms
dimensions: Tile Size: 12" x 24" (30.5 cm x 61 cm)

name: Airslate
subtitle: Natural Stone Fabric
heading: Authentic Natural Stone Elegance
description: Porcelanosa's Airslate Natural Stone Fabric combines the timeless beauty of natural stone with modern manufacturing precision. This premium material features authentic stone textures and natural color variations, creating a unique and sophisticated aesthetic. Ideal for both interior and exterior applications, Airslate offers exceptional durability and a luxurious appearance that enhances any architectural design.
keyFeatures: Suitable for interior and exterior use
dimensions: Panel Size: 48" x 96" (122 cm x 244 cm)

name: Johnsonite
subtitle: Rubber Flooring
heading: Commercial-Grade Rubber Flooring
description: Tarkett's Johnsonite Rubber Flooring is engineered for high-traffic commercial environments where durability and performance are paramount. This premium rubber flooring solution offers excellent slip resistance, sound absorption, and comfort underfoot. The resilient material withstands heavy use while maintaining its appearance, making it ideal for healthcare facilities, educational institutions, and commercial spaces.
dimensions: Tile Size: 24" x 24" (61 cm x 61 cm)

name: Cila Chair
subtitle: Seating Collection
heading: Contemporary Seating Design
description: The Cila Chair by Arper represents the perfect fusion of contemporary design and functional comfort. This versatile seating collection features clean lines, ergonomic design, and premium materials. Suitable for both residential and commercial settings, the Cila Chair offers exceptional comfort and style. The thoughtful design ensures long-lasting durability while maintaining a lightweight and stackable form factor.
keyFeatures: Lightweight and stackable for easy storage
Suitable for residential and commercial use
dimensions: Overall: L 400 x W 160 x H 80 cm (Overall: 157.48" L x 62.99" W x 31 1/2" H)
Seat H 45cm x W 80 cm (Seat: 17 3/4" H x 31 1/2" W)
